name: The Last Hunter
description:
The player will have to go to other dimensions to extract resources and destroy monsters!

Each dimension contains its own valuable resources and has its own complexities and secrets!

The game will appeal to those who love complexity and grind!

Get resources to upgrade your hero!

To take out the resources you need to get to the exit from the location and not die!

In another dimension, you have little time, you need to hurry.

When the time runs out, you will be teleported to a boss that you are not yet ready to face!

Chop enemies with a sword and extract resources with an ax and pickaxe, travel between worlds! Make potions and upgrade your hero!

Move the character using the "A" and "D" keys, hit using the left mouse button or the right mouse button to jump! Open inventory "B".

Chop enemies with a sword and extract resources with an ax and pickaxe, travel between worlds! Make potions and upgrade your hero!
